channel.title: nest on Fireship
channel.description: Recent content in nest on Fireship

item.title: Setup Nest on Cloud Functions
item.description: The following snippet demonstrates two different techniques for setting up NestJS on Firebase Cloud Functions. Option A - Point a Function to Nest The first setup modifies the functions configuration to use the Nest /dist output, as opposed to the default functions directory. This option is ideal if you have an existing Nest app. Step 1 - Create Nest App command line nest generate app server Step 2 - Add Functions Add functions, then delete the automatically generated directory.
